title: The customization update
message: Latest version: 0.1.8 One of the biggest updates yet: - Added trainer avatar, including most clothing options from the original game (as of now many pieces suffer from clipping)* - Added top path objectives (rotom/regieleki) - Added a battle start animation - Added a preview phase to blind pick inspired by the chinese beta - Added lots of sound effects* - Cresselia joins the fight - Other bug fixes and small improvements *Hyper massive thanks to elchicoeevee for all the help and resources he provided, these changes would've been basically impossible without him. On certain platforms the player clothes may take more time to download, if you don't see your avatar it's probably still downloading Thank you for downloading this game, welcome to the my unite recreation! As this is an early build bugs are expected and 100% going to happen, if you find any please report them in my discord server (link in the itch page) Currently not every feature from the original is implemented, here's a list of features that are missing and planned to be added: - Jump Pads - Quick chat - Wild pokemon AI - Some moves on certain pokemons - More settings options - Keyboard controls - Other things i may have missed But why should you play this? Idk at least you can't get slowbro united here. Jokes aside this is mainly so my concepts can actually be played. If quick join isn't finding any match it's likely that there are no open rooms at the moment, in that case i suggest you create an open room yourself. Lastly i hope you enjoy the experience and have some fun! Made with passion by JustMarcy (Of course the original game is owned by Timi studios, this project was purely made for educational purposes and does not intend to replace in any way the original)
